cLanguageProgramBegin.NAME: Thénionis
cLanguageProgramBegin.FLAVOR: One of the ancient sacred swords of the pole position, it is made of special talismans joined in a specific order and requires maintenance using CF896C.
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b3 #yAttack cards played, gain #b4 block and #b2 #ylose-memory at the start of the battle.

Crystal_Brooch.NAME: Crystal Brooch
Crystal_Brooch.FLAVOR: The brooch that my sister gave to Chtholly also served as a witness to Cordelia's first memories with William.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you get #ylose-memory each turn,gain [E] .

Grimoire.NAME: Grimoire
Grimoire.FLAVOR: A replica of a magical book left behind by humans from a certain period.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, #yTransform #b2 Magic cards, then #yUpgrade them.

C_Plus.NAME: Thénionis(adjusted)
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b2 #ySkill cards played, gain #b4 block and #b4 #ylose-memory at the start of the battle.
